attributes.action: Srap the current road tax system and increase the tax on fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The obvious, cheapest, most environmentally friendly and fair way to tax car use in this country is to simply levy all road related tax on fuel. This will cut millions of public money from an inneficient government body, and be the most direct and fair way to tax road use, not to mention the simplest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
